ultima Package¶

httpclient Module¶

class ultima.httpclient.HttpClient(baseUrl, headers, auth, status_codes)[source]¶

An interface over the requests library.

You will almost certainly not call this class manually.

Self.session is an object that adheres the requests api the object should be an rauth instance if the server expects an oauth token

call(partial_url, method, headers, data, url_vars, form_encoding)[source]¶

Sends an authenticated request via the requests module.

Returns a data or error dictionary

exception ultima.httpclient.MissingHttpMethod[source]¶

A valid http method must be set to make a request

ultima Module¶

class ultima.ultima.Endpoint(client, options)[source]¶

Callable

call(*args, **kwargs)¶

Entry point for url and data params

Variables:
  • url_defaults – Optional positional argument defining default url named parameters.
  • kwargs – payload for requests.
optional_fields = {'url_defaults': {}, 'headers': {}, 'form_encoding': True, 'prevKey': None, 'nextKey': None}¶

the optional keys for the json input to construct an endpoint

refresh()[source]¶

Sends the last request again.

required_fields = ['url', 'method']¶

the required keys for the json input to construct an endpoint

class ultima.ultima.Network(options)[source]¶

An object containing a custom http client and callables representing the endpoints for the network.

Dynamic Public API is all available endpoints.

Variables:
  • _client – a custom HttpClient
  • _translations – a dictionary to map network specific terminology to Ultima terms
optional_fields = {'headers': {}, 'translations': {}, 'auth': None}¶

Class variable. The optional keys for the json input to construct an network

required_fields = ['baseUrl', 'status_codes']¶

Class variable. The required keys for the json input to construct an network

setEndpoint(method, endpoint_options)[source]¶

Assign a callable to the endpoint name

exception ultima.ultima.RequiredField[source]¶

This field is required for instantiation

class ultima.ultima.Ultima(options)[source]¶

A Common interface for creating networks and endpoints. Dynamic Public API is the available networks.

Create a network w/ options for each key, value pair in options.

Iteration returns the networks created during instantiation.

setEndpoint(options)[source]¶

Calls an setEndpoint on each network w/ options for each key.

Options is of the form:

{ method: { network1: {options}, network2: {options} }
